feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v3.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed?

üöÄ Features

  • Modules in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12741 by @kavinvenkatachalam
  • Inspector UI Revamped in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12786 by @shaurya-sharma064
  • Import and export support for page permissions in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12740 by @vjaris42 and @devanshu052000

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Correct Safari version check for PDF support detection in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12916 by @johnsoncherian
  • Fixed inspector breaking for duplicate component name and other minor fixes in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12990 by @shaurya-sharma064
  • FX toggle not appearing on hover in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/13007 by @shaurya-sharma064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v3.14.0...v3.15.0

entry.title: New release for ToolJet: v3.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

üöÄ Features

  • Enhanced workflow permission system (Phase 2) by @kriks7iitk in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12869

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes

  • Resolved database migration issues by @rohanlahori in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/13053
  • Fixed incorrect imports in plugin scripts by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/13055
  • Hide modules tab in the editor interface by @kavinvenkatachalam in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/13051
  • Deprecated static local data sources by @gsmithun4 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12687

üß™ Specs

  • Added support for cloud plugin scripts by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/12995
  • Implemented automated merging for submodule PRs when base PR merges to main by @adishM98 in https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/pull/13057

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ToolJet/ToolJet/compare/v3.15.0...v3.15.1
